data.prayer: Father, help your children in Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Zamboanga del Sur to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, make the church in Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Zamboanga del Sur that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Yakan people might believe through him.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Zamboanga del Sur hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines has a population of 3,230,100.

We estimate Zamboanga del Sur has 449,946 people who might know Jesus, 2,488,324 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 291,830 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
